name: Doc Martin

summary_text: When the mother of his infant son unexpectedly passes away, struggling actor Mark grapples with fatherhood and his inability to grow up. And when he sparks with a single mother, he learns how his choices have real-life consequences.

name: The Woman Who Ran
summary_text: While her husband is on a business trip, Gamhee meets three of her friends on the outskirts of Seoul. They make friendly conversation but there are different currents flowing independently of each other, both above and below the surface.

name: 12 Days of Terror
summary_text: For twelve days in July, 1916, a shark patrolled the waterways of northern New Jersey. This docudrama is based on Richard Fernicola's account of those days.

name: Nain souruzu

name: The Trespasser
summary_text: Two businessmen hire a hitman to kill their third partner and are then blackmailed by the hitman as he takes over their company.

name: Prehysteria!
summary_text: A young boy and his family embark on a series of adventures when the boy finds some mysterious eggs which hatch to reveal a brood of baby dinosaurs.

name: Dive Bomber
summary_text: A military surgeon teams with a ranking navy flyer to develop a high-altitude suit which will protect pilots from blacking out when they go into a steep dive.

name: Little Fish
summary_text: A couple fights to hold their relationship together as a memory loss virus spreads and threatens to erase the history of their love and courtship.

name: Hisss
summary_text: Based on the Far Eastern myth of the snake woman who is able to take on human form.

name: Infinitum: Subject Unknown
summary_text: A mind-bending slice of British science fiction, with cameos from Sir Ian McKellen and Conleth Hill. Jane (Tori Butler-Hart) is trapped in a parallel universe and is forced to find a way to alter her reality before it is too late.

name: The List
summary_text: A lawyer inherits an interest in a mysterious secret society following his father's death. He is then courted by members of the shady organization and uncovers the sinister secrets and deceit that exists at the heart of the organization.

name: Sl8n8

summary_text: During a heat wave, a fireman hero/Charlie Sheen has it in for the family next door and whoever else bothers him.

summary_text: After her banishment from Rome, Jewish Princess Salome returns to her Roman-ruled native land of Galilee where prophet John the Baptist preaches against Salome's parents, King Herod and Queen Herodias.

name: The Black Room
summary_text: Ignoring an ancient prophecy, evil brother Gregor seeks to maintain his feudal power on his his Tyrolean estate by murdering and impersonating his benevolent younger twin.

summary_text: A young girl studies classical ballet. As a young woman she turns to modern dance and choreography.

name: The Gabby Douglas Story
summary_text: The story of the international gymnastics phenomenon who overcame overwhelming odds to become the first African American ever to be named Individual All-Around Champion in artistic gymnastics at the Olympic Games.

name: Posthumous
summary_text: After false reports of his demise put him and his work on the map, an artist decides to continue the charade by posing as his own brother. Soon, a reporter enters his life and has a profound effect on him.

name: Rajio no jikan
summary_text: Just before the live airing of a radio play, an actress decides to change the name of her character. This cascades into a battle of egos by all involved that causes continual script changes while the play is on-air live.

name: Taboo
summary_text: A female friend of a sexually frustrated mother tries broadening her horizons with a sex orgy. Though avoiding it, the new feelings inside her cause her to force herself on her sleeping son. To her amazement, the seduction is mutual.

name: Ramen Shop
summary_text: A young man who is curious about his deceased parents' past takes a food journey to Singapore where he uncovers more than just delicious meals.

name: Stille hjerte
summary_text: Three generations of a family coming together over a weekend. A sick mother's wish to die before her disease worsens gets harder to handle as old conflicts come to the surface.

summary_text: With the help of a young runaway, a feisty 14-year-old fights to keep her idyllic island home from the clutches of developers.

summary_text: A group of very efficient robbers strikes banks in downtown area of Stockholm. Detective Klara and commanding officer Krona takes on the case.

name: The Cat in the Hat
summary_text: A red and white-striped top-hatted cat visits two children left home alone.

name: Mes nuits sont plus belles que vos jours
summary_text: A story of doomed passion by two mortally ill people: he is physically, she is mentally.

name: Ilsa the Tigress of Siberia
summary_text: In 1953, nestled deep in the unforgiving Siberian Tundra, the Stalinist Gulag 14 is a purgatory under the command of the brutally seductive tormentor, Ilsa. More than two decades later, the camp's sole survivor thirsts for retribution.

name: None But the Brave
summary_text: During WW2, a platoon of Marines crash-lands on a tiny Pacific island occupied by a small Japanese unit.

summary_text: A man, working for cinema industry, has dreams about becoming a producer. He tries so many things for his dreams becomes true but must to manage so many bad situations.

name: The Heyday of the Insensitive Bastards
summary_text: Based on short stories from Robert Boswell's collection, seven vignettes explore the difference between fantasy and reality, memory and history, and the joy and agony of the human condition.

name: The Music of Silence
summary_text: Born with a serious eye condition that eventually leads to his blindness, Bocelli nevertheless rises above the challenges, driven by great ambitions towards his passion. The silent pursuit of his daily mission continues.

name: Inuyasha the Movie 4: Fire on the Mystic Island

name: Adrift in Manhattan
summary_text: The lives of three lonely strangers intersect while commuting on New York's 1 and 9 subway lines.

name: Neulovimye mstiteli
summary_text: A group of teenagers named "Imperceptible avengers" fight on the side of red army during the civil war in Russia.

name: Mad World
summary_text: A mentally ill stockbroker struggles to reconcile with his estranged father and his perturbed ex-fiancée.

name: Countdown
summary_text: When a madman kidnaps a young boy and rigs him with explosives, Ray defies his captain and takes matter into his own hands. Now he must beat the clock and save the innocent child.

name: By Any Means
summary_text: A C-list celebrity gets kidnapped and held hostage after a night-club appearance. When the police interrogate the man she accuses, they question whether she's after justice or a front-page story.

name: Free the Nipple
summary_text: A group of women launch a movement to remove the censor of women's breasts all over America.

name: Carne de neón

summary_text: A rookie gangster takes part in a criminal operation and screws up, so his enemies come after him for revenge.

name: Nijam
summary_text: A young man is guided by his mother in a methodical manner to avenge his father against the perpetrators who falsely accused and killed him.

name: The Minion
summary_text: A 1500 year old body of one of the Knights Templar is discovered below New York's subway. Soon, a demonic minion and a modern Templar Knight are drawn to its secrets. So begins a battle for nothing less than the fate of the entire world.

name: La leggenda del santo bevitore
summary_text: An alcoholic homeless man is given two hundred francs by a stranger, who requests that when he can he will return the money to Saint Therese in the cathedral.

name: Gunman's Walk
summary_text: A powerful rancher always protects his wild adult son by paying for damages and bribing witnesses, until his crimes become too serious to rectify.

name: The Swallows of Kabul
summary_text: Summer 1998, Kabul in ruins is occupied by the Taliban. In love despite the daily violence and misery, Mohsen and Zunaira want to believe in the future. But a senseless act by Mohsen will upset their lives forever.

summary_text: Kenny Parker and Lolita Nowicki, each struggling with their own brand of demons, meet by chance in Chicago and form a pact to travel across the country to the Golden Gate Bridge to commit suicide together.
